Package com.github.actionfx.core.annotation

Annotation Type AFXValidateSize

  • @Repeatable(AFXValidateSizes.class)
@Target(FIELD)
@Retention(RUNTIME)
public @interface AFXValidateSize
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Control for validating user input that has been entered inside the annotated control and its value has to be of a certain size.

    In case the property value is of type String, the length of the string is checked. In case the property value is a Collection, then the size of this collection is validated.

    Author:
    koster

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      long max
      The maximum value that the control needs to have to pass validation.
      java.lang.String message
      Validation error message to be displayed, in case the control failed validation.
      java.lang.String messageKey
      Properties key to a validation error message to be displayed, in case the control failed validation.
      long min
      The minimum value that the control needs to have to pass validation.
      boolean required
      Indicates whether the annotated control is mandatory to be filled out.
      ValidationMode validationMode
      Defines, when the actual validation is performed.
      int validationStartTimeoutMs
      Defines the timeout in milliseconds that has to pass after changing a control value, before the actual validation is applied to.
      ControlProperties validationTargeProperty
      Defines, which control value shall be validated.

    • Element Detail

      • min

        long min
        The minimum value that the control needs to have to pass validation. If there is no value specified for this attribute, no minimum validation is applied.
        Returns:
        the minimum value. Default is Long.MIN_VALUE (which means, "no minimum specified").
        Default:
        -9223372036854775808L

      • max

        long max
        The maximum value that the control needs to have to pass validation. If there is no value specified for this attribute, no maximum validation is applied.
        Returns:
        the maximum value. Default is Long.MAX_VALUE (which means, "no maximum specified").
        Default:
        9223372036854775807L

      • required

        boolean required
        Indicates whether the annotated control is mandatory to be filled out. By using this attribute, the annotation AFXValidateRequired does not to be added to the control.
        Returns:
        true, if the annotated control needs to have a user value, false otherwise. Default is false.
        Default:
        false

      • message

        java.lang.String message
        Validation error message to be displayed, in case the control failed validation.
        Returns:
        the validation error message
        Default:
        ""

      • messageKey

        java.lang.String messageKey
        Properties key to a validation error message to be displayed, in case the control failed validation. A value in this attribute has a higher priority than the value specified in message().
        Returns:
        the properties key to the validation error message
        Default:
        ""

      • validationTargeProperty

        ControlProperties validationTargeProperty
        Defines, which control value shall be validated. Default is ControlProperties.USER_VALUE_OBSERVABLE.
        Returns:
        the target property to validate. Default is ControlProperties.USER_VALUE_OBSERVABLE.
        Default:
        com.github.actionfx.core.view.graph.ControlProperties.USER_VALUE_OBSERVABLE

      • validationStartTimeoutMs

        int validationStartTimeoutMs
        Defines the timeout in milliseconds that has to pass after changing a control value, before the actual validation is applied to.

        This value is only used, if validation mode ValidationMode.ONCHANGE is supplied in attribute validationMode().

        Returns:
        the timeout value in milliseconds. Default is -1 (no timeout specified).
        Default:
        -1

      • validationMode

        ValidationMode validationMode
        Defines, when the actual validation is performed.

        Possible options are:

        • ValidationMode.ONCHANGE: Validation is applied, when a change occurs in a control that holds any validation annotation.
        • ValidationMode.MANUAL: Validation occurs only, when an explicit call to ActionFX.validate(Object) is performed.
        *
        Returns:
        the validation mode. Default is ValidationMode.ONCHANGE.
        Default:
        com.github.actionfx.core.annotation.ValidationMode.ONCHANGE
